name: .BDT2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .BDT2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Document created by BEEDOCS Timeline 3D 2, a program used for capturing timelines and historical events; may include pictures, dates, sounds, video, notes, and other event information; used for sharing timelines through videos or interactive presentations.

content: Timeline 3D projects can be published as interactive timelines to the Web, as video to YouTube or iTunes, or as part of a Keynote presentation.
NOTE: Timeline 3D version 3 uses the .BDT3 extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
